stories.title: Rename CLI from qwen to damie

tasks.title: Update package.json bin field

tasks.description: Add 'damie-code' alias to bin field, ensure 'damie code' subcommand works

tasks.title: Rename internal qwen references in CLI package

tasks.description: Find and replace 'qwen' with 'damie' in packages/core/src/**/*.ts (excluding qwen OAuth which stays)
